arts.ttl: Real Madrid midfielder could have joined Villarreal in the summer – report
arts.sum: Real Madrid face off against Villarreal later tonight in La Liga, hoping to reclaim top position in the table, at least provisionally. Manager Xabi Alonso has some major selection decisions to make ahead of the game, especially in midfield where he has plenty of resources but only three spots to fill. arts.ttl: Villarreal Coach Marcelino Predicts Win Over Real Madrid If One Thing Happens
arts.sum: After a strong start to the season, winning six games in a row in La Liga, the loss to Atletico Madrid was a tough one. Marcelino revealed that there is always a chance of beating a team as strong as Real Madrid, and the start of the game would be very important.

arts.ttl: Militao, Valverde start in a 4-3-3 – How Real Madrid can line up against Villarreal
arts.sum: After their 5-0 triumph over Kairat Almaty in the UEFA Champions League, Real Madrid return to La Liga action tonight as they take on Villarreal at the Santiago Bernabeu. The Merengues were hammered 2-5 by neighbours Atletico Madrid in their previous league encounter last week, and, thus, will be intent on producing a strong reaction. arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs. Villarreal: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Real Madrid have suffered just two defeats to Villarreal in the last seven years.

arts.ttl: Official: Key return as Real Madrid name squad to face Villarreal
arts.sum: The squad of players called upon by La Liga giants Real Madrid for the club’s next outing has on Friday been unveiled online. And it features one altogether noteworthy return.…

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Villarreal in La Liga
arts.sum: Alonso: “No player, not Valverde, Rodrygo, or Vini Jr., has ever told me they don't want to play in a position. Alonso: “We spend a lot of time together and we have that closeness, preparing for games, celebrating victories, and feeling the pain of defeats.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid squad list to face Villarreal – key defender returns
arts.sum: As Real Madrid get set to take on Villarreal on Matchday 8 of La Liga, manager Xabi Alonso has announced the squad list for the match. The big news is that key defender Eder Militao is back in the squad after missing the midweek UEFA Champions League clash against Kairat Almaty.
